title: Ola Electric market share drops to 27% in September from 31% last month as rivals gain ground
description: As per data, Ola Electric sold 23,965 units in September, compared to 26,928 units in August and 40,814 units in July. Competitors Bajaj Auto, TVS Motors, and Ather Energy, recorded market shares of 21.4%, 20.2%, and 14.8%, respectively.
content: Listed electric two-wheeler maker Ola Electric has witnessed a drop in its market share in September, amid intense competition. The Bengaluru-based companyâ€™s market share fell to 27.9% in September, down from 31.3% in August and 39.2% in July, according to Vahan data.
